title: Eagles Injuries, Lions RBs and Downgrading Le'Veon Bell (Fantasy Football Today in 5 Debut Episode)
description:
Fantasy Football Today in 5, the fastest way to keep up with fantasy football, released its first episode today, which you can find right here. Download and subscribe now for more insight and advice from the FFT crew! Our regularly scheduled Monday episode of Pick Six will be dropping soon so stay tuned!
On FFT in 5, the crew reacts to the Jalen Reagor injury and wonder if it's time to drop Carson Wentz in the rankings. Also, Le'Veon Bell's training camp could be going better, and as D'Andre Swift struggles to return to practice you need to move Kerryon Johnson up your draft board!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
